Room.Name: Islandia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Islandia Drive, north of the Golden Shield and south of the North Oceancrest Hot Springs and Spa.
Room.LongDescription: The Golden Shield has a reputation for being one of the best shield makers in all of Oceancrest. All the Royal Shields are made here, as well as many other fighter's prized shields from all over the land. On the north side of the road is the North Oceancrest Hot Springs and Spa, where tired warriors can go for a quick break before continuing on.
